thread.section_title: CustomUSB Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CustomUSB | customusb.com
thread.title: On-The-Spot Logistics

author: On-The-Spot Logistics
title: On-The-Spot Logistics
text: I needed to order a replica of a piece of construction equipment as well as other items. The renderings were fantastic. So much so, that I was skeptical that they could produce an actual item that look that good. Well they did. They also made as many updates and changes as they needed to satisfy my request. Even in mid-production I asked for a small change in imprinting and they were able to deliver. I hope I get to use them soon for other items. No regrets.
